entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
